characteristics.local_vibe: Serious spot with a high presence of experienced surfers.
A local's spot for experienced surfers; quiet and focused.
hazards_list: Strong currents (pulling left out of the bay)

characteristics.local_vibe: Generally a local's spot, but welcoming if you show respect. The lineup can be competitive on good days.
characteristics.water_quality: Generally clean, though proximity to the port can occasionally affect it.

characteristics.local_vibe: Competitive, but doable. Respect the locals.
Quiet and often surfed by those in the know. Not a busy, social spot.
A well-guarded local treasure; can be highly competitive at the main peak, especially with visiting professional surfers in the lineup.
hazards_list: Extremely shallow water at the main peak (risk of injury)

characteristics.local_vibe: Popular with surf schools and international surfers; can be competitive and vocal at the main reef peak, especially on good days.
Varied peaks spread crowds.
Friendly and instructional, but busy; strictly enforced zones for surfers and swimmers.
Can be competitive due to its location and consistency.
Popular and lively in summer; the main peak can be competitive.
hazards_list: Powerful shorebreak/shallow sandbank at main peak
Longshore current (pulls south towards Morro Jable)

characteristics.local_vibe: Serious big-wave spot; reserved for highly skilled surfers.
Relaxed and family-friendly; popular with learners.
hazards_list: Very shallow water at the end of the wave

characteristics.local_vibe: Popular with surf schools and families
Lively and shared; priority must be given to kite and windsurfers on windy days.
Can be busy, especially on weekends
Majestic, pristine, and isolated. A spot for adventure and solitude.
hazards_list: Extreme isolation (No lifeguards, no quick emergency services)
Waves are consistently more powerful than they appear from the beach

characteristics.local_vibe: World-class wave attracting good surfers.
Respectful but serious; reserved for experienced surfers.
Popular and can be busy, but generally tolerable.
Relaxed and family-friendly.
Peaceful and secluded
Known for strong localism; respect for local surfers is essential.
A welcoming hub for surf schools and a mix of local and visiting surfers; the foundational spot for the southern surf community.
hazards_list: Strong currents (especially pulling south towards cliffs)
Powerful waves (often stronger than they appear from the cliff)
Rocks (in specific areas, e.g., near the bay's entrance)
Optical illusion of wave size from the cliff top

characteristics.local_vibe: Secluded and peaceful; favored by hikers and those seeking solitude.
Secluded and undeveloped.
Relaxed and often frequented by longboarders. Generally uncrowded.
characteristics.water_quality: Good, but can be affected by harbour proximity.

characteristics.local_vibe: Very quiet and isolated. You will likely be surfing alone or with a handful of others.
Competitive but tolerant; a high-performance wave with a dedicated local and visiting crew.
Chill and relaxed evening sessions.
Shared with windsurfers when Calima wind picks up
Serious big-wave spot with tow-in potential
Localistic; reserved for experienced surfers who know the spot.
Relaxed and instructional, perfect for learning.
hazards_list: Currents (pulling out to sea at the southern end)
Rocks (at the southern end near the hotel)
Dense wave frequency on bigger days

characteristics.local_vibe: Relaxed and less crowded, but can get busy with wind-sports during peak wind hours.
hazards_list: Shallow rocky bottom with stone slabs
Wind- and kitesurfers during trade winds

characteristics.local_vibe: Shared with windsurfers and surf schools.
Solitary and secluded.
Popular and accessible spot.
Protected by locals; respect is essential.
Friendly and popular with local families and campers; a respected spot where a friendly attitude is appreciated.
hazards_list: Two currents: safe channel (north) & dangerous cliff-bound current (south)
Rocks/round stones on bottom after storms
Optical illusion - waves are stronger than they appear from the cliff

characteristics.local_vibe: Competitive and reserved for experts; high respect for locals is mandatory
Lively and accessible, shared by wingfoilers, windsurfers, and beginner surfers.
